articles.description: The actor, 53, shares three sons - Griffin, 20, Holand, 18, and Leland, 16 - with his ex-wife Afton Smith, who he divorced in 2007 after nine years of marriage.
articles.content:
Brendan Fraser has spoken about his eldest son Griffin, who is autistic and obese, and said he 'understands' what it is like to be close to someone who lives with obesity.

articles.title: Dominic West recreates Prince Charles iconic breakdance on Kimmel - Daily Mail
articles.description: The actor, 53, was a guest on the late-night show to discuss his role as Princes Charles in The Crown, and addressed backlash he's faced from fans complaining he's 'too handsome' for the role.
